headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' https://*.walletconnect.org 'unsafe-inline'; style-src 'self' https://fonts.googleapis.com https://www.alphaping.xyz 'unsafe-inline'; img-src * 'self' data: blob: https://walletconnect.com https://secure.walletconnect.org https://ipfs.io; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com; connect-src 'self' https://alpha-ping.onrender.com wss://alpha-ping.onrender.com; frame-src 'self' https://verify.walletconnect.com; frame-ancestors 'self';
